title: Divya Kundanalu: Diamond & Gemstone Embellished Jhumka Earrings
materials: Natural Emerald. Showcases the unparalleled Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Intricately designed openwork Jhumka with delicate filigree patterns inspired by traditional South Indian architecture. Features a floral motif at the stud with ruby and emerald accents. Embellished with pave-set diamonds throughout the jhumka bell and cascading beaded dangles at the bottom. The craftsmanship reflects the 'Addigai' style with a modern twist.
colors: Green (emerald). The traditional combination of red
and gold symbolizes prosperity and good fortune.
occasions: or any occasion where you want to showcase traditional elegance with a touch of modern brilliance. Also ideal for half-saree function (Voni Function) and Seemantham.
description: These Kundanalu are a testament to timeless elegance and impeccable craftsmanship. The combination of brilliant-cut diamonds, rich gemstones, and intricate filigree work creates a truly captivating piece. Crafted with high-purity gold and superior Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting beauty and durability. The traditional design holds significant cultural value, making it a cherished heirloom. The perfect blend of tradition and modern aesthetics.
